What did you do yesterday afternoon?
I just watched TV all day.
Did you? I called you but you didn't answer.
I couldn't get it because I was taking a shower then.
Could you Speak Chinese when you were 7?
No, I couldn't speak Chinese then.
But now I can speak Chinese.
Where were you an hour ago?
I was playing in the backyard.
You didn't hear me calling your name?
